article.Heading: GST Council to discuss rates of about 70-80 goods on Sep 9
article.Summary: Watch CNBC-TV18's Timsy Jaipuria give details about a crucial GST Council meet to be held on September 9 to discuss rates of about 70-80 goods, and 20-30 services.
article.Body: Watch CNBC-TV18's Timsy Jaipuria give details about a crucial GST Council meet to be held on September 9 to discuss rates of about 70-80 goods, and 20-30 services.
